name: Tom Kristensen
introduction: Tom Kristensen (born 7 July 1967 in Hobro, Mariagerfjord, Nordjylland, Denmark) is a retired Danish racing driver who has won the 24 Hours of Le Mans a record nine times.  He spent four years as a test driver for various Formula One teams in the latter half of the 1990s, testing for Minardi, Tyrrell, Williams, Jaguar and Michelin tyres.  Despite this, he never raced in F1.
